name: Enedos
description:
Made in 48 hours for the 2022 Global game jam

Bip, a little alien lives on planet Enedos. It's a peaceful planet, very suitable for living. Too suitable in fact, as everyone else wants to live there too. At night enemies try to invade Enedos. You must help Bip collect scraps from the destroyed ships and build guns and shields to defend his planet.
